# Manlift Tender Announcement

## Contract Details

### Reference Number
PW-23-01024648

### Solicitation Number
21120-23-4120880A

### Notice Date
2023-02-03

### Tender Closing Date
2023-02-20T14:00:00

## Project Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a supplier for one (1) manlift, as per the following specifications:

* [GSIN](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/procurement-notices/documentation/gsin-inventory-number) code: *N3990
* Description: *Materials Handling Equipment, Miscellaneous

## Contract Requirements

* The requested delivery date is June 30th, 2023.
* Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-18LIFT/A.

## How to Bid

This tender is open to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-18LIFT/A. For information on becoming a pre-qualified supplier, refer to:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-650-75040

## Contract Administration

* Contact Information:
	+ Danielle Blanchet, Contracting Authority
	+ Email: [Danielle.Blanchet@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Danielle.Blanchet@csc-scc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 506-377-9624
* Debriefings: unsuccessful bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of notification.

## Additional Information

* This tender is published as a result of the federal government's trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Region of delivery: New Brunswick
